title: Sleep, Caradhras (1C84)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Fellowship: Exert Gandalf to discard every condition.
Lore:	”'Losto Caradhras, sedho, hodo, nuitho i ruith.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	”Discard every condition” means to discard every active condition. Inactive conditions are not discarded.
